price: 133. Una degdega denbi dhaaf xagga Rabbigiin ah iyo Beer (Janno) ballaceedu le'eg yahay samooyinka iyo arlada, loo diyaariyey kuwa iska ilaasha (shirkiga iyo xumaha kale ee dhowra Amarrada Alle).
arabic: ۞ وَسَارِعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَغۡفِرَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرۡضُهَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ أُعِدَّتۡ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wasāriʿū ilā maghfiratin min rabbikum wajannatin ʿarḍuhā al-samāwātu wal-arḍu uʿiddat lil'muttaqīna
